fields.name: Header2_0
fields.fieldText:
Error


This contact is an existing community member. Please select a different contact or create a new contact

fields.name: Header3_0
fields.fieldText: Community User Settings for {!contactFirstName} {!contactLastname}

fields.name: SalesChannelMSG_0
fields.fieldText: Note: The Sales Channel for the contact has previously been set to {!contactcommunitySalesChannel}. Select again to keep these settings or select new options.

fields.name: Permissions_0
fields.helpText:
Manage Users: Create and edit User Accounts for users of your account. Also, allows for the management of My Account functions such as Account Branding and Custom Products management.


Order Create: Ability to place an Order to Gardner Denver, either from a converted Quote or Quick Order.


Warranty Claim / Start Up Submission: Ability to create and submit warranty claims and/or start up claims to Gardner Denver.

fields.name: Header3
fields.fieldText: Community User Settings for {!contactFirstName} {!contactLastname}

fields.name: Profilescr
fields.helpText:
Global Account User: Can access, view and act on-behalf of accounts across your account hierarchy.


Single Account User: Can access, view and act on-behalf of only the account the user is associated to.

fields.name: SalesChannelMSG
fields.fieldText: Note: The Sales Channel for the contact has previously been set to {!contactcommunitySalesChannel}. Select again to keep these settings or select new options.

fields.name: Permissions
fields.helpText:
Manage Users: Create and edit User Accounts for users of your account. Also, allows for the management of My Account functions such as Account Branding and Custom Products management.


Order Create: Ability to place an Order to Gardner Denver, either from a converted Quote or Quick Order.


Warranty Claim / Start Up Submission: Ability to create and submit warranty claims and/or start up claims to Gardner Denver.
